comment.author: 94495740@N00
comment._content: They are all purty scary looking.

comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content: Hi, Thanks for your comment - I agree that this group don't look the happiest bunch. But John Thomas, the famous photographer from Ceredigion traveled throughout Wales and took a great deal of photos of ordinary people either at home or by their workplace. If you are interested in seeing more examples of his work and learning more about John Thomas, please see the National Library of Wales' website: www.llgc.org.uk/index.php?id=johnthomas

comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called FrigateRN's Pictures of Interest., and we'd love to have this added to the group! I suspect that these poor souls would not have had much to smile about if they were living in an alms house.

comment.author: 69673105@N00
comment._content:
Did he take any of the nearby almshouses at Llanfwrog?
My gg grandmother was there, probably from 1871 when her husband died, until 1888.
